item.title: Quick tip! Using QuickChart.IO with dynamic values (Canvas app edition)
item.description: (This is lengthy for a quick tip, whoops, scroll all the way down to quickly check the fix) First of all, FULL credit goes to Pen Warner who graciously shared his QuickchartIO code with me that he used for his app. His app is awesome, check that out here. He’s on Twitter here: @p3nf0ld His Blog I was trying to do dynamic data into a quickchart.IO code, which I learned how to do in Kristine’s video here Go check her out as well, she’s awesome!
